decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No vehicles shall enter the site in connection with the current use of Unit 2, or activities take place outside Unit 2 (within Phoenix Trading Park site), outside the hours 0600 to 2300 Monday to Friday, 0700 to 1800 Saturday, and 0900 to 1600 on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.

Condition : 3 - The site shall only be used for purposes under Class B1(b), Class B1(c), Class B2 and Class B8 of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 or purposes directly ancillary thereto unless otherwise approved by the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - The parking, loading and turning spaces approved in front of Unit 2 in 00505/Y/P36 shall be maintained and such spaces shall not be used for any other purpose.
Condition : 5 - There shall be no means of access (vehicular or pedestrian) to the site (excluding the electricity sub-station) from Springvale Avenue.

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order), no further extensions or additions shall be constructed without the prior permission of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 7 - There shall be no heavy goods vehicle deliveries to Unit 2 on Sundays, Public or Bank Holidays.
description: Variation of condition 3 (hours of vehicle access) of 00377/K2/P1 approved 12/09/2011 which varied condition 1 (vehicle access) of planning permission 00505/Y/P37 approved 09/11/2006 which removed condition 2 (floor space) of planning permission 00505/Y/P36 approved 02/12/1982, to change to wording of the condition 3 to no vehicles shall enter the site in connection with the current use of unit 2 outside the hours 06:00 to 23:00 Monday to Friday, 07:00 to 18:00 Saturday, and 09:00 to 16:00 Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.
